songs.title: Let Me Try
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Tell me now
Why  are you not here anymore?
I’ve  been walking sad
Carrying all the love for you in my heart

[Pre Chorus 1]
Although you did so much damage to me

[Chorus]
U  turned me off all night
U  took me into the dark
U made me cry sometimes
You’ve  been always hurting my heart

[Verse 2]
Where are you now
I’ve been looking for you over the sky
But there’s no star
Only  a small light refusing to shine

I forgot the past
But I don’t know if it’s wrong or right
Oh Please, think about me
If you ever hide your hopes and dreams

[Pre Chorus 2]
And think how much damage you did to me

[Chorus]
U turned me off all night
U took me into the dark
U made me cry sometimes
You’ve been always hurting my heart

U turned me off all night
U took me into the dark
U made me cry sometimes
You’ve been always hurting my heart
